forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High around 20C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 69F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some passing clouds. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 21C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 71F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing late. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 59F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
